title: Efficacy and Tolerance of Transcutaneous Ionizing Radiations to Prevent Restenosis Caused by Intimal Hyperplasia on Prosthetic Haemodialysis Vascular Access

operands.value: significant stenosis (maximal systolic speed 3 times > from basal maximal systolic speed, stenosis > 70% on angiography)
venous segment 5 cm after the anastomosis of a prosthetic haemodialysis vascular access (at least 1 month old)
Must have minimum age of 18 Years

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('Must have minimum age of 18 Years'), Symbol('over 18 years'), Symbol('signed informed consent'), Symbol('significant stenosis (maximal systolic speed 3 times > from basal maximal systolic speed, stenosis > 70% on angiography)'), Symbol('social security affiliation'), Symbol('successful angioplasty (residual stenosis < 30%)'), Or(Symbol('venous segment 5 cm after the anastomosis of a prosthetic haemodialysis vascular access (at least 1 month old)'), Symbol('venous-prosthesis anastomosis')), Not(Or(Symbol('angioplasty with stenting'), Symbol('contra-indications of radiotherapy'))))
